name: Reprobate: A Game about Choices (and lack thereof)
name_original: Reprobate: A Game about Choices (and lack thereof)
description:
Nobody wants to be in jail on a Friday afternoon, least of all you.  But if you want to help your clients get back on probation, you need to learn more about what happened and why they are being held.  So you're traveling to the Gaol County Jail to get two clients' stories--here's hoping you'll think of some kind of plan...

(This will hopefully be the first installment of a larger simulation game.)

[Note: Due to some formatting issues on itch.io, it is easiest to play this game here]
